articles.description: After JioPhone, Reliance is out to democratise laptops. It is working on a 4G-enabled laptop that will run JioOS and could see a launch by the end of 2021.

articles.title: Oppo overtakes Huawei to lead Chinese smartphone market for first time - The Verge
articles.description: Oppo took 21 percent of the Chinese smartphone market in January, according to Counterpoint Research. The figure means Oppo overtook Huawei and became the leading smartphone vendor in China for the first time.
articles.content:
